verses.verse: And when any <WH5315> will offer <WH7126> <WH8686> a meat <WH4503> offering <WH7133> unto the YY <WH3068>, his offering <WH7133> shall be of fine flour <WH5560>; and he shall pour <WH3332> <WH8804> oil <WH8081> upon it, and put <WH5414> <WH8804> frankincense <WH3828> thereon:

And he shall bring <WH935> <WH8689> it to Aharon's <WH175> sons <WH1121> the Kohanim <WH3548>: and he shall take <WH7061> <WH8804> thereout <WH8033> his handful <WH7062> <WH4393> of the flour <WH5560> thereof, and of the oil <WH8081> thereof, with all the frankincense <WH3828> thereof; and the Kohen <WH3548> shall burn <WH6999> <WH8689> the memorial <WH234> of it upon the altar <WH4196>, to be an offering made by fire <WH801>, of a sweet <WH5207> savour <WH7381> unto the YY <WH3068>:

And the remnant <WH3498> <WH8737> of the meat offering <WH4503> shall be Aharon's <WH175> and his sons <WH1121> ': it is a thing most <WH6944> holy <WH6944> of the offerings <WH801> of the YY <WH3068> made by fire <WH801>.

And if thou bring <WH7126> <WH8686> an oblation <WH7133> of a meat offering <WH4503> baken <WH3989> in the oven <WH8574>, it shall be unleavened <WH4682> cakes <WH2471> of fine flour <WH5560> mingled <WH1101> <WH8803> with oil <WH8081>, or unleavened <WH4682> wafers <WH7550> anointed <WH4886> <WH8803> with oil <WH8081>.
And if thy oblation <WH7133> be a meat offering <WH4503> baken in a pan <WH4227>, it shall be of fine flour <WH5560> unleavened <WH4682>, mingled <WH1101> <WH8803> with oil <WH8081>.
Thou shalt part <WH6626> <WH8800> it in pieces <WH6595>, and pour <WH3332> <WH8804> oil <WH8081> thereon: it is a meat offering <WH4503>.
And if thy oblation <WH7133> be a meat offering <WH4503> baken in the fryingpan <WH4802>, it shall be made <WH6213> <WH8735> of fine flour <WH5560> with oil <WH8081>.

And thou shalt bring <WH935> <WH8689> the meat offering <WH4503> that is made <WH6213> <WH8735> of these things unto the YY <WH3068>: and when it is presented <WH7126> <WH8689> unto the Kohen <WH3548>, he shall bring <WH5066> <WH8689> it unto the altar <WH4196>.

And the Kohen <WH3548> shall take <WH7311> <WH8689> from the meat offering <WH4503> a memorial <WH234> thereof, and shall burn <WH6999> <WH8689> it upon the altar <WH4196>: it is an offering made by fire <WH801>, of a sweet <WH5207> savour <WH7381> unto the YY <WH3068>.

And that which is left <WH3498> <WH8737> of the meat offering <WH4503> shall be Aharon's <WH175> and his sons <WH1121> ': it is a thing most <WH6944> holy <WH6944> of the offerings <WH801> of the YY <WH3068> made by fire <WH801>.

No meat offering <WH4503>, which ye shall bring <WH7126> <WH8686> unto the YY <WH3068>, shall be made <WH6213> <WH8735> with leaven <WH2557>: for ye shall burn <WH6999> <WH8686> no leaven <WH7603>, nor any honey <WH1706>, in any offering <WH801> of the YY <WH3068> made by fire <WH801>.

As for the oblation <WH7133> of the firstfruits <WH7225>, ye shall offer <WH7126> <WH8686> them unto the YY <WH3068>: but they shall not be burnt <WH5927> <WH8799> on the altar <WH4196> for a sweet <WH5207> savour <WH7381>.

And every oblation <WH7133> of thy meat offering <WH4503> shalt thou season <WH4414> <WH8799> with salt <WH4417>; neither shalt thou suffer the salt <WH4417> of the covenant <WH1285> of thy 'Elohim <WH430> to be lacking <WH7673> <WH8686> from thy meat offering <WH4503>: with all thine offerings <WH7133> thou shalt offer <WH7126> <WH8686> salt <WH4417>.

And if thou offer <WH7126> <WH8686> a meat offering <WH4503> of thy firstfruits <WH1061> unto the YY <WH3068>, thou shalt offer <WH7126> <WH8686> for the meat offering <WH4503> of thy firstfruits <WH1061> green ears <WH24> of corn dried <WH7033> <WH8803> by the fire <WH784>, even corn beaten <WH1643> out of full ears <WH3759>.
And thou shalt put <WH5414> <WH8804> oil <WH8081> upon it, and lay <WH7760> <WH8804> frankincense <WH3828> thereon: it is a meat offering <WH4503>.

And the Kohen <WH3548> shall burn <WH6999> <WH8689> the memorial <WH234> of it, part of the beaten corn <WH1643> thereof, and part of the oil <WH8081> thereof, with all the frankincense <WH3828> thereof: it is an offering made by fire <WH801> unto the YY <WH3068>.
